data.actual_result: The area is freezed only showing who was talking in the past Vc and you (when you talk)
data.expected_result: The area that show users talking (under the text box) should change
data.short_description: When moving to another voice channel, the area that shows who was talking is frozen like you were in the past channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Enter to a voice channel (I entered in a music one) - Go to another voice channel
